page.title: 13Animals
page.content: One of the fascinating features about Brockenhurst is the number of animals roaming freely around the streets of the village. This is due to very old established grazing rights going back many hundreds of years. It is a common sight in the village to see {Horses {with foals,Donkeys, Cows, Bulls and {Pigs}striding purposefully up the road. The animals are accepted by the locals and enjoyed by the tourist. They have a remarkable sense of road safety but nearly 100 of them get killed throughout the New Forest every year. The local property owners have to protect their property from the animals otherwise they will destroy the foliage.
